data.meta_description: Obituary for Robert Clyde Wise | Robert Clyde Wise, D.C., passed away peacefully at Susque View on Wednesday, December 5, 2018. Born in Lock Haven on December 22, 1935, Dr. Wise was a lifelong resident of Lock Haven, spending his...

data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
